channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tesla wants to bring robotaxis to San Francisco. Here’s what’s standing in the way.
item.description: There will be an employee in the driver's seat -- a big change from how things have been working in Austin.

item.title: Intel is spinning off its Network and Edge group
item.description: Intel will remain an anchor investor in the stand-alone company, which produced $5.8 billion in revenue in 2024.

item.title: Meta names Shengjia Zhao as chief scientist of AI superintelligence unit
item.description: Shengjia Zhao, a former OpenAI researcher, will round out the leadership team at Meta's new AI lab.

item.title: Tesla Readies a Taxi Service in San Francisco—but Not With Robotaxis
item.description: The electric car maker informed California that it will operate a limited public taxi service. But it’s not legally allowed to do this with self-drivi...

item.title: Index Ventures’ Jahanvi Sardana shares the truth about TAM and what founders should focus on instead
item.description: Index Ventures partner Jahanvi Sardana has a reminder for all those founders worried about finding TAM for their product or service: many startups hav...

item.title: Join Our Next Livestream: Inside Katie Drummond’s Viral Interview With Bryan Johnson
item.description: On July 31, WIRED’s global editorial director discusses the world of wellness—and beyond—with WIRED reporters.

item.title: India bans streaming apps you’ve never heard of — but millions watch
item.description: India has ordered the blocking of 25 streaming services — many with millions of viewers and even paying subscribers — for allegedly promoting "obscene...

item.title: Somnee Smart Sleep Headband Review: High-Tech Help
item.description: This wearable tech maps your brain using EEG sensors and algorithms, delivering therapeutic stimulation to improve sleep. And it succeeds, sort of.

item.title: The Best Samsung Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From flagship and budget to flipping and folding, Samsung’s Galaxy range spans the breadth of the smartphone cosmos. WIRED’s here to help you make you...

item.title: Trump’s Anti-Bias AI Order Is Just More Bias
item.description: The Trump administration says it wants AI models free from ideological bias, as it pressures their developers to reflect the president’s worldview.
